channel.title: Help spells
channel.description: how do i make it wear i can do the spell Telekenetic Grab and in the yannile magic tower place how do i make u can go through the portal? how do i make the npcs walk around and auto start attking u??

item.title: Help spells
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

For the telekenetic grab, I’m pretty sure you’ll have to do something with the picking items up off the ground packet.

As for the portal, you can edit your first object click packet (132).

And to answer your last question, I think you’d do that with the goodDistance boolean.

Read full topic
